714:55: sarvatathāgatān praṇipatyāhū yaivamāha-“bhagavantastathāgatā ājñāpayata kathaṃ pratipadyāmi kīdṛśaṃ tat tattvam” iti|

714:331: atha bhagavānavācamahābodhisattvasamayasaṃbhavadharmādhiṣṭhānavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ sarvatathāgatajāpasamayaṃ nāma sarvatathāgatahṛdayaṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrabhāṣa||

714:333: bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭvaikadhano vajrajāpavigrahaḥ prādurbhūya,
714:336: sarvatathāgatadharmatādini sarvabuddharddhivikurvitāni kṛtvā svavācatvād vajrasattvasamādheḥ sudṛḍhatvāccaikaghanaḥ avācamahābodhisattvakāyaḥ saṃbhūya,

714:344: sarvatathāgatavāgjñānasamayaṃ aśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātuvāksiddhisarvasukhasaumanasyānubhavanārthaṃ yāvatsarvatathāgatavāgguhyatāprāptyuttamasiddhaye tadvajrajāpaṃ tasmai avācāya mahābodhisattvāya tathaiva pāṇibhyāmanuprādāt|
714:346: atha vajravāco bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena vajrajāpena sarvatathāgatān saṃllāpayannidamudānamudānayāmāsa|
714:357: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sarvakarmasamatājñānasuprativedhatvāt vajrasattvasamādheḥ sa eva bhagavan vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatakarmasamayo bhūtvā viniḥsṛtaḥ,
714:360: sa sakalaḥ sarvatathāgatakarmadhāturbhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭvaikaghanaḥ sarvākāśadhātusamavasaraṇapramāṇastataḥ sarvatathāgatakarmadhātutaḥ karmavajravigrahaḥ prādurbhūya,
714:371: atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatāmoghavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadya,
714:372: sarvatathāgatapūjāpravartanādyaprameyāmoghasarvakarmavidhivistarasamayaśeṣāna-vaśeṣasattvadhātusarvakarmasiddhisarvasukhasaumanasyānubhavanārthaṃ yāvat sarvatathāgatavajrakarmatājñānābhijñottamasiddhiphalahetostatkarmavajraṃ tasmai sarvatathāgataviśvakarmaṇe mahābodhisattvāya sarvakarmacakravartitve sarvatathāgatavajrābhiṣekeṇābhiṣicya,
714:375: atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsatvastadvajraṃ svahṛdi sthāpya,
714:378: ahaṃ mama kare dattaṃ viśve viśvaṃ niyojitam|| iti||
714:380: atha bhagavān duryodhanavīryamahābodhisattvasamayasaṃbhavakarmādhiṣṭhānavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ sarvatathāgatarakṣāsamayannāma sarvatathāgatahṛdayaṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrarakṣa||
714:381: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajrapāṇirdṛḍhakavacāni bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya,
714:382: bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭvaikaghano mahāvajrakavacavigrahaḥ prādurbhūya,
714:396: atha vajramitro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tena vajravarmeṇa sarvatathāgatān kavacayannidamudānamudānayāmāsa|
714:400: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvamārapramārdemahābodhisattvasamayasaṃbhavakarmādhiṣṭhānavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ sarvatathāgatopāyasamayaṃ nāma sarvatathāgatahṛdayaṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrayakṣa||
714:401: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharo mahādaṃṣṭrāyudhāni bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya,
714:402: bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭvaikaghano vajradaṃṣṭrāvigrahaḥ prādurbhūya,
714:416: atha vajracaṇḍo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastadvajradaṃṣṭrāyudhaṃ svamukhe pratiṣṭhāpya,
714:421: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgatamuṣṭimahābodhisattvasamayasaṃbhavakarmādhiṣṭhānavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyadaṃ sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittavajrabandhasamayannāma sarvatathāgatahṛdayaṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrasandhi||
714:422: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatasarvamudrābandhā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya,
714:423: bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭvaikaghano vajrabandhavigrahaḥ prādurbhūya,
714:429: aho hi sudṛḍho bandhaḥ samayo'haṃ dṛḍhātmanāṃ|
714:435: sarvatathāgatamudrābandhasamayamaśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātusarvatathāgatadevatāsānnidhyakalpanāt sarvasiddhisukhasaumanasyānubhavanārthaṃ yāvatsarvatathāgatasarvajñānamudrādhipatyottamasiddhiphalahetostadvajrabandhaṃ tasmai sarvatathāgatamuṣṭaye mahābodhisattvāya tathaiva pāṇibhyāmanuprādāt|
714:437: atha sa vajramuṣṭirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tena vajrabandhena sarvatathāgatān bandhayannidamudānamudānayāmāsa|
714:446: atha khalvakṣobhyastathāgato bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya sarvatathāgatajñānāni niṣpādya,
714:447: sarvatathāgatajñānamudraṇārthaṃ vajrāpāramitāsamayobhdavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatavajrasamayāṃ nāma sarvatathāgatamudrāṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra sattvavajri||
714:449: tebhyaśca vajraraśmibhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā,
714:457: atha bhagavān ratnasaṃbhavastathāgataḥ bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya sarvatathāgatajñānamudraṇārthaṃ ratnapāramitāsamayasaṃbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ vajraratnasamayāṃ nāma svamudrāṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra ratnavajri||
714:459: tebhyo ratnaraśmibhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā,
714:467: atha bhagavān lokeśvararājastathāgato bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya sarvatathāgatajñānamudraṇārthaṃ dharmapāramitāsamayodbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ dharmasamayāṃ nāma svamudrāṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra dharma vajri||
714:469: tebhyaḥ padmaraśmibhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā,
714:473: aho hi sarvabuddhānāṃ dharmavajraṃ ahaṃ śuci|
714:474: yatsvabhāvaviśuddhyā vai rāgo'pi hi sunirmalaḥ|| iti||
714:476: atha bhagavānamoghasiddhistathāgato bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya sarvatathāgatajñānamudraṇārthaṃ karmapāramitāsaṃbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatakarmasamayāṃ nāma svamudrāṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra karmavajri||
714:478: tebhyaśca sarvatathāgatakarmaraśmimabhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā,
714:491: atha bhagavān vairocanaḥ punarapi sarvatathāgataratipūjāsamayasaṃbhavavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatakulamahādevīṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajralāsye||
714:493: tebhyo vajramudrāmukhabhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā,
714:494: punarapyekaghanā mahādevī vajrasattvasadṛśātmabhāvā vicitravarṇarūpaliṅgeryāpathā sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitā sarvatathāgatakulasaṃgrahabhūtā vajrasattvadayitā saṃbhūya,
714:497: aho na sadṛśī me'sti pūjā hyanyā svayaṃbhuvāṃ|
714:500: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgataratnamālābhiṣekasamayodbhavavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadya māṃ sarvatathāgatakulamahādevīṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajramāle|
714:502: tābhyo mahāratnamudrābhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā,
714:508: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgatasaṃgītisamayasaṃbhavavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatakulamahādevīṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajragīte||
714:510: tābhyaśca sarvatathāgatadharmamudrābhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā,
714:516: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgatanṛtyapūjāsamayodbhavavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatakulamahādevīṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajranṛtye|
714:517: athāsmina viniḥsṛtamātrāyāṃ sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sarvatathāgatanṛtyapūjāvidhivistarā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtāḥ|
714:518: tebhyaśca sarvatathāgatasarvanṛttapūjāvidhivistarebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā,
714:529: atha punarapi bhagavān akṣobhyastathāgato bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya pūjāpratipūjārtha sarvatathāgatapralhādanasamayodbhavavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatagaṇikāṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajradhūpe||
714:530: athāsyāṃ viniḥsṛtamātrāyāṃ sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ anekavidhā dhūpapūjāmeghavyūhāḥ sarvavajradhātuspharaṇā bhūtvā viniścaritāḥ|
714:533: bhagavato vajramaṇiratnaśikharakūṭāgārasya koṇe vāmapārśve candramaṇḍalāśritā bhūtvedamudānamudānayati sma|
714:537: atha bhagavān ratnasaṃbhavastathāgato bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya pūjāpratipūjārtha ratnābharaṇapūjāsamayasaṃbhavavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatapratīhārīṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrapuṣpe||
714:538: athāsyāṃ viniḥsṛtamātrāyāṃ sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvapuṣpapūjāvyūhāḥ sarvākāśadhātuspharaṇā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtāstebhyaśca sarvapuṣpapūjāvyūhebhyaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā viniḥsṛtya,
714:544: atha bhagavān lokeśvararājastathāgato bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya pūjāpratipūjārtha sarvatathāgatālokapūjāsamayodbhavavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatadūtīṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrāloke|
714:545: athāsyāṃ viniḥsṛtamātrāyāṃ sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvālokapūjāvyūhāḥ sakaladharmadhātuspharaṇā bhūtvā viniścaritāḥ|
714:550: aho hyahaṃ mahodārā pūjā dīpamayī śubhā|
714:553: atha bhagavānamoghasiddhistathāgato bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya pūjāpratipūjārthaṃ sarvatathāgatagandhapajāsamayasaṃbhavavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgataceṭīṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajragandhe||
714:554: athāsyāṃ viniḥsṛtamātrāyāṃ sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvagandhapūjāvyūhāḥ sarvalokadhātuspharaṇā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtāḥ|
714:555: tebhyaśca gandhapūjāvyūhebhyaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥ samāstathāgatavigrahā viniḥsṛtya punarapyekaghano vajragandhadevatākāyaḥ saṃbhūya,
714:558: yattathāgatagandho vai sarvakāye dadāti hi|| iti||
714:565: atha bhagavān vairocanastathāgataḥ punarapi sarvatathāgatasamayāṃ kuśamahāsattvasamayasaṃbhavasattvavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyeyaṃ sarvatathāgatasarvamudrāgaṇapatiṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrāṃkuśa||
714:566: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātra sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatasarvamudrāgaṇā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtaḥ|
714:573: yanmayā hi samākṛṣṭā bhajante sarvamaṇḍalam|| iti||
714:575: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgatasamayapraveśamahāsattvasamayasaṃbhavasattvavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadya maṃ sarvatathāgatamudrāpraveśapratīhāraṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrapāśa||
714:576: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatasamayapraveśamudrāgaṇā bhūtvā viniścaritaḥ|
714:579: bhagavato vajramaṇiratnaśikharakūṭāgārasya ratnadvāramadhye candramaṇḍalāśrito bhūtvā sarvatathāgatāṃ praveśayann,
714:584: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgatasamayasphoṭamahāsattvasamayodbhavasattvavajrannāmasamādhiṃ samāpadyemaṃ sarvatathāgatasamayabandhannāma sarvatathāgatadūtaṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrasphoṭa||
714:585: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatasamayabandhamudrāgaṇā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtastebhyaśca sarvatathāgatasamayabandhasarvamudrāgaṇebhyaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā viniḥsṛtya,
714:593: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgatāveśamahāsattvasamayasaṃbhavasattvavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemaṃ sarvatathāgatasarvamudrāceṭaṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrāveśaḥ||
714:594: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatasarvamudrāgaṇā bhūtvā viniścaritaḥ|
714:601: yatsarvapatayo bhūtvā ceṭā api bhavanti hi|| iti||
714:609: atha tena kṣapālavamuhūrtena sarvatathāgatācchaṭikāsaṃjñāsaṃcoditāḥ sarvalokadhātuprasarameghasamudreṣu sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatāḥ sabodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalāḥ samājamāpadya,
714:610: yena bhagavān vajramaṇiratnaśikharakūṭāgāro yena ca bhagavān vairocanastenopajagmurupetya oṃ sarvatathāgatapādavandanāṅkaromi||
714:611: ityenena prakṛtisiddhena mantreṇa rucijaptena sarvatathāgatapādavandanāṃ kṛtvedamudānamudānayāmāsuḥ||
714:614: athedamuktvā te daśadiksarvalokadhātusannipatitāḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhānena bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye sabodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalāḥ praviṣṭāḥ|
714:615: tebhyaśca sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ svāni svāni bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalāni viniḥsṛtya bhagavato vajramaṇiratnaśikharakūṭāgārasya sarvapārśveṣu maṇḍalībhūtvā samāpadyāvasthitā idamudānamudānayāmāsuḥ|
714:619: atha bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ punarapi samājamāgamyāsya vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalasyādhiṣṭhānāyāśeṣānavaśeṣasya ca sattvadhātoḥ paritrāṇasarvahitasukhāvāptyai yāvatsarvatathāgatasamatājñānābhijñābhisaṃbodhyuttamasiddhaye bhagavantaṃ sarvatathāgatādhipatiṃ svavajrasattvamanādinidhanaṃ mahāvajradharamanena nāmāṣṭaśatenādhyeṣitavantaḥ||
714:661: atha bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatādhyeṣaṇavacanamupaśrutya sarvatathāgatasamayasaṃbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānannāma samādhiṃ samāpadye vajradhātunnāma mahāmaṇḍalamudājahāra|
714:690: tato vai samyagāgrīntu mudrāṃ badhvā yathāvidhi|
714:691: vajrācāryaḥ praviṣṭvā tu sphoṭya mudrāṃ samāviśeta||15||
714:704: tato dvāreṣu sarveṣu karma kṛtvāṅku śādibhiḥ|
714:707: sādhayeta mahāsattvo jaḥ hūm vaṃ hoḥ pravartayan||7||
714:718: santi bhagavantastathāgatāḥ kecit sattvā mahāpāpakāriṇaste idaṃ vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalaṃ dṛṣṭvā praviṣṭā ca sarvāpāyavigatā bhaviṣyanti|
714:719: santi ca bhagavantaḥ sattvāḥ sarvārthabhojanapānakāmaguṇagṛddhāḥ samayadviṣṭāḥ puraścaraṇādiṣvaśaktāḥ|
714:722: sarvāśāparipūrisaṃpadabhūteṣu niruttararatiprītiharṣasaṃbhavakareṣu sarvatathāgatakulamaṇḍaleṣu śikṣāpadabhayabhītā na praviśanti|
714:724: santi ca punarbhagavanto dhārmikāḥ sattvāḥ sarvatathāgataśīlasamādhiprajñottamasiddhyupāyairbuddhabodhiṃ prārthayanto dhyānavimokṣādibhirbhūmibhiryantaḥ kliśyante|
714:727: tatrādita eva tāvat sarvatathāgatapraṇāmacatuṣṭayaṃ kārayet| tadyathā|
714:730: tathava sthito vajrāñjaliṃ hṛdi kṛtvā lalāṭena praṇamedanena mantreṇa oṃ sarvatathāgatapūjābhiṣekāyātmānanniryātayāmi savatathāgatavajraratnābhiṣiñca mām||
714:731: tatastathaivotthāya vajrāṃjalibandhena śirasā mukhena praṇamedanena mantreṇa oṃ sarvatathāgatapūjāpravartanāyātmānaṃ niryātayāmi sarvatathāgatavajradharma pravartaya mām||
714:732: tatastathaiva sthito vajrāṃjaliṃ śiraso'vatārya hṛdi kṛtvā murdhnā praṇamedanena mantreṇa oṃ sarvatathāgatapūjākarmaṇe ātmānanniryātayāmi sarvatathātavajrakarma kuru mām||
714:733: tato raktavastrottarīyo raktapaṭṭakāvacchāditamukhaḥ sattvavajrimudrāṃ bandhayedanena hṛdayena samayastvam||
714:734: tato madhyāṅgulidvayena mālāṃ granthyā praveśayedanena hṛdayena samaya hūṃ||
714:742: tataḥ svayaṃ vajrācāryaḥ sattvavajramudrāmeva mūrdhvāmukhīṃ badhvā vajraśiṣyasya mūrdhni sthāsyaivaṃ vadet|
714:745: tatastayaiva samayamudrayā udakaṃ śapathahṛdayena sakṛt parijñāpya,
714:749: nirbhidya tatkṣaṇaṃ yāyād yadi brūyādimaṃ nayam||
714:754: mā te viṣamāparihāreṇa kālakriyāṃ kṛtvā narapatanaṃ syād” iti uktvā,
714:778: tatastāṃ mudrāṃ badhvā svahṛdi mokṣayedanena hṛdayena
714:783: hūṃ ha ha ha ha hoḥ||
714:784: tatastāṃ mālāṃ mahāmaṇḍale kṣepayedanena hṛdayena pratīccha vajra hoḥ||
714:786: tatastāṃ mālāṃ gṛhya tasyaidha śirasi bandhayedanena hadayena oṃ pratigṛṇhatvamimaṃ satvaṃ mahābalaḥ||
714:787: tayā bandhayā tena mahāsattvena pratīcchito bhavati,
714:789: tatastathāviṣṭasyaiva mukhabandhaṃ muṃcedanena hṛdayena oṃ vajrasattvaḥ svayante'dya cakṣūddhāṭanatatparaḥ uddhāṭayati sarvākṣo vajracakṣu ranuttaram||
714:796: kadācit bhagavān mahāvajradharaḥ svarūpeṇa darśanaṃ dadāti,
714:801: tato mahāmaṇḍalaṃ darśayitvā vajrādhiṣṭhitakalaśād gandhodakenābhiṣiṃcedanena hṛdayena vajrābhiṣiñca||
714:802: tatastvekatamāṃ mudrāṃ mālāṃ vadhvā svacinhaṃ pāṇau pratiṣṭhāpyaivaṃ vadet|
714:805: oṃ vajrādhipati tvāmabhiṣiṃcāmi tiṣṭha vajra samayastvam||
714:807: oṃ vajrasattva tvāmabhiṣiṃcāmi vajranāmābhiṣekataḥ he vajra nāma||
714:808: yasya yannāma kuryāttasya he-śabdaḥ prayoktavya iti||
714:822: vajrabimbaṃ tu jivhāyāṃ bhāvayed buddhimān naraḥ|
714:851: bhāvayan vajranetraṃ tu dadyād vidyādhṛtāṃ padam||3||
714:876: oṃ vajrasattvaḥ svayaṃ te'dya hṛdayaṃ samavasthitaḥ|
714:892: bhagena praviśet kāyaṃ striyāyāḥ puruṣasya vā|
714:893: praviṣṭvā manasā sarvaṃ tasya kāryaṃ samaṃ sphared|| iti|
714:901: “na kasyacit tvayānyasyaiṣāṃ mudrāṇāmakovidasya ekatarāpi mudrā darśayitavyā|
714:903: tathā hi te satvā adṛṣṭamahāmaṇḍalāḥ santo mudrābandhaṃ prayojayanti tadā teṣānna tathā siddhirbhaviṣyati|
714:904: tataste vicikitsā prāptā viṣamāparihāreṇa śīghrameva kālaṃ kṛtvāvīcīmahānarake patantaḥ|
714:910: prāpnoti sarvagāmitvaṃ buddhatvamapi na durlabham||2|| iti||
714:922: kṛtvā tu sādhayetsarvaṃ tataḥ paścād yathāsukham||5|| iti||
714:925: badhvā tu paratastaṃ tu mahāsattvaṃ prabhāvayet||1||
714:926: taṃ dṛṣṭvā jñānasattvaṃ tu svaśarīre prabhāvayet|
714:927: ākṛṣya praveśya badhvā vaśīkṛtvā ca sādhayet||
714:937: yasya sattvasya yā mudrā tāmātmānantu bhāvayet|
714:939: “jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ” bruvan kāye sarvabuddhān praveśayet|
714:940: manasā sādhuyogena sādhanaṃ tvaparam mahad|| iti||3||
714:944: sattvavajra yāntu mudrāyāṃ sarvaratnādhipaḥ sa tu||5||
714:945: siddhastu dharmavajra yā vai buddhadharmadharo bhavet|
714:961: vajrayakṣaṃ tu vai sādhya vajrayakṣasamo bhavet|
714:963: vajralāsyāṃ tu vai sādhya mahāvajraratiṃ labhet|
714:966: vajranṛtyāṃ tu saṃyojya sarvabuddhaiḥ sa pūjyate||16||
714:968: vajrapuṣpāṃ tu saṃyojya vaśīkuryājjagat sa tu||17||
714:985: samayagrāhikā mudrā bandhaṃ siddhiṃ ca karma ca||5||
714:995: sā eva varjakośā tu madhyamā mukhasandhitā||10||
714:999: sā eva tu samāgryā vai hṛdisthā suprasāritā||12||
714:1020: vajraketudharo bhūtvā sarvāśāḥ sa tu pūrayet|
714:1023: vajrakośāṃ tu saṃgṛhya sarvakleśāṃ cchinatti saḥ||24||
714:1030: lāsyayā ratayo divyāḥ mālayā bhūṣaṇāni ca|
714:1031: gītayā sphuṭavāco nityaṃ pūjāṃ labhati nṛtyayā||28||
714:1035: vajrasphoṭā tu bandhayād vajraghaṇṭā samāviśed||30|| iti||
714:1041: “aho sukha” iti prokte buddhānapi sa rāgayet|
714:1042: “sādhu sādhv” iti vai proktvā sādhukāraiḥ sa toṣayet||3||
714:1045: “artha-prāptira” iti prokte sarvāśāḥ pūrayet sa tu|
714:1046: “ha ha hūṃ he-” [ti prokte samabuddhahāsaṃ prāpnu] yāt||5||
714:1053: “śatru bhakṣa” iti prokte sarvaśatrun sa bhakṣayet|
714:1060: “hesphoṭa vaṃ” mahābandhā “ghaṇṭā aḥ aḥ” pracālite-|| ti||12||
714:1062: jivhāyāṃ bhāvayed vajrāṃ sarvakarmāṇi kurvate|| ti||13||
714:1068: akṣobhyasya bhūmisparśā ratne tu varadā tathā|
714:1097: vajratuṣṭyā jināḥ sarve sādhukārān dadanti hi||17||
714:1101: vajrasmitāṃ samādhāya hased buddhaiḥ samaṃ laghu||19||
714:1115: bandhayed vajranigaḍā vajraghaṇṭā tu cālayed|| iti||26||
714:1117: tatrādita eva vajrabandhāṅgulīṃ tālaṃ kṛtvā hṛdaye,
714:1127: tatrādita eva svamudrāṃ badhvā svamudrāsatvamātmānaṃ bhāvayedanena hṛdayena samayo'ham||
714:1128: tataḥ svamudrāsattvamātmānaṃ bhāvya tenādhiṣṭhāyedanena mantreṇa samayasattvādhitiṣṭhasva mām|
714:1132: tatrādita eva arthasiddhimicchatā tena hṛdayena arthasiddhi||
714:1140: atha sarvamudrāṇāṃ sāmānyaḥ svakāyavākcittavajreṣu vajrīkaraṇavidhivistaro bhavati|
714:1150: sarvakarmasu ca me cittaśreyaḥ kuru hūṃ
714:1151: ha ha ha ha hoḥ bhagavan sarvatathāgatavajra mā me muṃca,
714:1153: “anenānantaryakāriṇo'pi sarvatathāgatamokṣā api saddharmapratikṣepakā api sarvaduṣkṛtakāriṇo'pi sarvatathāgatamudrāsādhakā varjasattvadṛḍhībhāvādihaiva janmanyāsu yathābhirucitāṃ sarvasiddhimuttamasiddhiṃ vajrasiddhiṃ vajrasattvasiddhiṃ vā yāvat tathāgatasiddhiṃ vā prāpsyantī-“tyāha bhagavāṃ sarvatathāgatavajrasattvaḥ|| ||
714:1155: tatrādita eva yatoyataḥ samutpannā mudrā tān tatratatraiva muñcedanena hṛdayena vajra muḥ||
714:1156: tato hṛdayotthitayā ratnavajrimudrayā svābhiṣekasthānasthitayābhiṣicyāgrāṅgulibhyāṃ mālāṃ veṣṭavyaṃ badhvā tathaiva kavacaṃ bandhayedanena hṛdayena oṃ ratnavajrābhiṣiñca sarvamudrā me dṛḍhīkuru varakavacena vam||
714:1158: samatālayā toṣayedanena hṛdayena vajra tuṣya hoḥ||
714:1159: anena vidhinā mudrā muktā baddhāśca toṣitā|
714:1167: kalpoktaiḥ svakṛtairvāpi sādhanaṃ tvatra sarvataḥ|| iti||
714:1173: tato'bhyantaramaṇḍale'pyanenaiva vajrastutigītena vajranṛtyakarapuṭena gṛhya dhūpādibhiḥ pūjā kāryā|
714:1176: tataḥ “sarve yathāśaktyā pūjayantvi” ti sarvatathāgatān vijñāpya,
714:1178: yathā praviṣṭāṃ yathā vibhavataḥ sarvarasāhāravihārādibhiḥ sarvopakaraṇarmahāmaṇḍale niryātitaiḥ santuṣyedaṃ sarvatathāgatasiddhivajravrataṃ dadyāt|
714:1182: eṣa tvā dhārayāmi vajrasatva hi hi hi hi hūṃ||
714:1183: tataḥ ”sarveṣāṃ punarapi na kasyacid vaktavyam” iti śapathahṛdayamākhyeyaṃ|
714:1184: tato yathā praviṣṭān saṃpreṣya sarvatathāgatān vijñāpayet,
714:1187: oṃ kṛto vaḥ sarvasatvārthaḥ siddhirdattā yathānugā|
